    • Hydrological indicator calculations

Hydrological indicator calculations

Explore2_flow_statistics.Rmd

In this vignette, we compute all available numerical hydrological indicators available in CARD scripts.

library(EXstat)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(tidyr)

Import data:

df <- readr::read_tsv(
  system.file("examples", "Aqui-FR-Qnat.tsv", package = "EXstat")
)
#> Rows: 57342 Columns: 3
#> ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> Delimiter: "\t"
#> dbl  (2): H1700010, H5920014
#> date (1): date
#> 
#> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
#> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

Format data in tidy format:

dfQ <- df |> pivot_longer(!"date", values_to = "Q")
dfQ
#> # A tibble: 114,684 × 3
#>    date       name         Q
#>    <date>     <chr>    <dbl>
#>  1 1852-01-01 H1700010  0.97
#>  2 1852-01-01 H5920014  2.36
#>  3 1852-01-02 H1700010  5.13
#>  4 1852-01-02 H5920014 14.6 
#>  5 1852-01-03 H1700010 10.7 
#>  6 1852-01-03 H5920014 29.5 
#>  7 1852-01-04 H1700010 16.1 
#>  8 1852-01-04 H5920014 43.1 
#>  9 1852-01-05 H1700010 20.2 
#> 10 1852-01-05 H5920014 70.1 
#> # ℹ 114,674 more rows
CARD_dir <- "analysis1"
CARD_name = c("QMNA-5", "BFI_Wal")
CARD_tmp <- CARD_management(
  CARD_dir = CARD_dir,
  CARD_name = CARD_name,
  verbose = TRUE
)
#> [1] "PARAMETERS:"
#> [1] "    --CARD_path /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/EXstat/CARD"
#> [1] "    --CARD_tmp /tmp/Rtmp6m6qE4/file1daa2a7d2fda"
#> [1] "    --layout analysis1 [ QMNA-5 BFI_Wal ]"
#> [1] "    --underscore_to_white TRUE"
#> [1] "    --add_id TRUE"
#> [1] "    --overwrite TRUE"
#> [1] "    --verbose TRUE"
#> [1] "done"
results <- CARD_extraction(
  data = dfQ,
  CARD_tmp = CARD_tmp,
  CARD_dir = CARD_dir,
  simplify = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE
)
results
#> $metaEX
#> # A tibble: 2 × 17
#>   variable_en unit_en      name_en   description_en method_en sampling_period_en
#>   <chr>       <chr>        <chr>     <chr>          <chr>     <chr>             
#> 1 QMNA-5      m^{3}.s^{-1} Annual m… ""             "1. mont… Month of maximum …
#> 2 BFI_Wal     without unit Baseflow… "Ratio betwee… "1. no t… NA                
#> # ℹ 11 more variables: topic_en <chr>, variable_fr <chr>, unit_fr <chr>,
#> #   name_fr <chr>, description_fr <chr>, method_fr <chr>,
#> #   sampling_period_fr <chr>, topic_fr <chr>, is_date <lgl>,
#> #   to_normalise <lgl>, source <chr>
#> 
#> $dataEX
#> # A tibble: 2 × 3
#>   name     `QMNA-5` BFI_Wal
#>   <chr>       <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1 H1700010     10.9   0.781
#> 2 H5920014     80.8   0.834
CARD_path <- system.file("CARD", package = "EXstat")
CARD_dir <- "__all__/Flow"
CARD_dirpath = file.path(CARD_path, CARD_dir)
script_to_analyse = list.files(
        path = CARD_dirpath,
        pattern = "\\.R$",
        recursive = TRUE,
        include.dirs = FALSE,
        full.names = FALSE
    )
script_to_analyse <- script_to_analyse[grepl("criteria", script_to_analyse)]
CARD_name <- gsub("\\.R$", "", basename(script_to_analyse))
# Remove indicators linked to Explore2 horizons
CARD_name <- CARD_name[!grepl("_H[0-3]*$", CARD_name)]
# Remove indicators that can't be computed (Qobs/Qsim comparisons)
CARD_name <- CARD_name[!grepl("Bias|KGE|NSE|STD", CARD_name)]
# Remove indicators that return logical
CARD_name <- CARD_name[!grepl("alpha", CARD_name)]
# Remove bugged indicators
CARD_name <- CARD_name[!CARD_name %in% c("med{dtRec}")]
results <- CARD_extraction(
  data = dfQ,
  CARD_name = CARD_name,
  simplify = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE
)
#> Warning in process_extraction(data = data, funct = funct, funct_args =
#> funct_args, : 'compress' is coherced to FALSE. 'compress' can be TRUE only if
#> 'time_step' is 'month', 'year-month', 'season' or 'year-season'.
results
#> $metaEX
#> # A tibble: 24 × 18
#>    variable_en   unit_en   name_en description_en method_en topic_en variable_fr

#> $dataEX
#> # A tibble: 2 × 25
#>   name     BFI_Wal   BFM `med{centerBF}` `med{dtBF}` `med{endBF}` `med{startBF}`
#>   <chr>      <dbl> <dbl>           <dbl>       <dbl>        <dbl>          <dbl>
#> 1 H1700010   0.781 0.870            50.5        179          144.            330
#> 2 H5920014   0.834 0.778            53          212.         164.            317
#> # ℹ 18 more variables: `med{vBF}` <dbl>, `med{dtFlood}` <dbl>,
#> #   `med{tQJXA}` <dbl>, Q10 <dbl>, `QJXA-10` <dbl>, `med{startLF}` <dbl>,
#> #   `med{centerLF}` <dbl>, `med{endLF}` <dbl>, `med{dtLF}` <dbl>,
#> #   `med{vLF}` <dbl>, `med{tVCN10}` <dbl>, Q90 <dbl>, `QMNA-5` <dbl>,
#> #   `VCN10-5` <dbl>, `VCN30-2` <dbl>, aFDC <dbl>, meanQA <dbl>, Q50 <dbl>
metaEX <- results$metaEX |> select("variable_en", "name_en", "unit_en")
dataEX <- metaEX |> 
  left_join(CARD_transpose_data(results$dataEX),
            by = join_by("variable_en" == "name")) |>
  mutate(unit_en = sprintf("$\\mathrm{%s}$", unit_en))
knitr::kable(dataEX, escape = FALSE)
